meanings.definition: A type of vehicle used for transporting passengers, typically pulled by a person on foot.
meanings.sent1: The rikishas lined up along the street, waiting for passengers.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, rikishas are still a common mode of transportation.
meanings.sent3: The rikishas in the city have a race every year for charity.
meanings.sent4: The rikishas moved through the crowded streets like colorful ants.
meanings.sent5: The tourists were amazed by the intricate designs on the rikishas.
